favourite.article: Blessed are those who welcome the Lord!!!! Lets gather faith through the Holy Spirit. Thanks once again for the Hymnal website. God Bless you all.
Thank you so very much. Be safe, safety is of the LORD.
A sinner like me still loves GOD. I always tremble when I hear God calling.
The song has a lot of inspirational message that one has to think about before the grace period is closed.

I saw myself singing this hymn with a choir in the dream---the impact on me was so great that I had to start looking for how to get the lyrics when I woke up, thank God I did....Just as I am Oh Lord, take me as Thine forever.

This is a great call from our Master. He continually pleads with us to hearken and follow Him like a Shepherd calls the sheep. Lord, help us with a kind heart to listen and hearken to the call-Come to Him Now!

This song makes one (me) picture Christ's humble look and gentle voice pleading with one (me) to come to Him. It really is sad when the Lord calls us to leave evil ways and follow Him yet we say no. Say yes to Jesus today, please. Thanks and God bless.
